featuredrecipes.title: Bengali Beef Curry
featuredrecipes.description: This spicy beef curry is best served with plain basmati rice or eaten with naan or pita bread.

featuredrecipes.title: Gulab Jamun
featuredrecipes.description: These are like little waffle balls that sit in and absorb a sugary rosewater syrup.

featuredrecipes.title: Adipoli Parathas
featuredrecipes.description: A very tasty snack that is easy to make. This whole wheat flatbread with a spiced shrimp filling makes a great sandwich.
